document.full_text: slugger adrian gonzalez has agreed a seven-year, $154 million deal to remain with the boston red sox, the major league baseball website (www.mlb.com) said on friday.
document.title: gonzalez signs $154 million deal to stay with boston
lines_and_colors: slugger adrian gonzalez has agreed a seven-year, $154 million deal to remain with the boston red sox, the major league baseball website (www.mlb.com) said on friday.
